name: SYRINGE PUMP PROJECT
description: Typical non-clinical syringe pumps can cost between $300 to $5,000 USD, making the economic benefits of a homemade syringe pump immediately apparent.

name: MICROFLUIDIC DEVICE
description: Microfluidic Devices provide an effective way to mix and sort liquids at a microscopic scale, reducing the need for high quantities of liquid.

name: MULTIMATERIAL PLIERS
description: Multimaterial methods are a great way to create a functional part with various mechanical properties, like pliers.

name: BIKE PHONE HOLDER
description: Top-Down Modeling can be used for models with various integrated components, so it was used to create this bike phone holder.

name: GENERATED SKATEBOARD TRUCK
description: This skateboard truck was created using generative design methods to minimize material use while still withstanding high impact forces.
